puzzle: Tick… tock… time betrays,

Light reveals what darkness keeps,

A switch, a glow, a sudden shine,
The next clue waits below the line.
Higher still — his bravest climb,
Cooki thought he'd run out my time.

Look up now — you're near his place.

puzzle: Above the cars, above the ground,
